page.title: 20DALRY CIVIC WEEK PROGRAMME
page.content: {SAT. 22nd JUNE-}Gala Day Festival- Parade, Concert, Displays, Crowning of Civic Week Queen {SUN. 23rd-}Football sixes competition Inter-church service {MON. 24th-}Children's party Pub darts competition Bridge tournament {TUE. 25th-}Carpet bowling competition Golf medal Car/Motorbike competitions {WED. 26th-}Krypton Factor/Potted sport Old Folks' Concert {THU. 27th-}WRI Craft Exhibition Netball Tournament West Sound Road Show Disco {FRI. 28th-}Ceilidh Concert Over 18's Disco {SAT. 29th-}Blair Gymkhana Road race Karate Display Concert and Prize-giving.
